job.title: Data Scientist
job.description: <p><strong>Data Scientist/Analyst </strong></p><p><strong>Location: SFO, CA (Remote can work from anywhere but wiling to work Pacific hours).</strong></p><p><strong>3 Rounds of Interview</strong></p><p><strong>&nbsp;</strong></p><p><strong>Mandatory:</strong></p><p>·&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;3+ years of data science, data analytics, or business intelligence experience</p><p>·&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Strong understanding of SQL</p><p>·&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Experience with conducting data analysis in Python and / or R</p><p>·&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Experience building clear and easy to understand dashboards and presentations </p><p>·&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Ability to communicate clearly and effectively to cross functional partners of varying technical levels</p><p>·&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Ability to define relevant metrics that can guide and influence stakeholders to appropriate and accurate insights</p><p><strong>&nbsp;</strong></p><p><strong>Pluses</strong></p><p>·&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Familiarity with Superset</p><p>·&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Familiarity with running weblab experiments, efficacy studies, or product validation tests</p><p>·&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Familiarity with machine learning basics</p><p>·&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Familiarity with Client infrastructure, including Airflow, Presto SQL, and Hive SQL</p><p>·&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Experience creating and maintaining data pipelines</p><p>·&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Experience supporting engineering product work</p>
